title: The Secret Wintergatan Sound - Now For Everyone!
description:
Speldosa - Wintergatan Musix Box! Check it out 🙏

Desktop Version: 
https://www.klevgrand.com

Ipad and Iphone: 
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/speldosa/id6446171628

I have been dreaming about this for such a long time, so proud and happy to be able to introduce Speldosa - Wintergatan Music Box

This Virtual Software instrument was created in Collaboration with Klevgränd - a boutique plugin creative studio from Stockholm. I highly recommend you checking out Klevgränds other plugins - everything they do is awesome. Huge thanks to Klevgränd for this collaboration.

Subscribe to Klevgränd on youtube:
https://www.youtube.com/@klevgrand

This sound means so much to me, i created it by sampling my own music box and i have used it on almost all my songs to date. This was the sound that started my music career. I cant wait to see what you all create with it.

Post your #Speldosa music and videos online so i can check them out!

Music: "Sunrise" By Wintergatan
Video edited By Martin and Hannes Knutsson from the Trainerds youtube Channel check it out here:

https://www.youtube.com/@Trainerds



#4k #wintergatan
